AI Description: OpenAI Gym is a toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms. It provides a diverse set of environments for training and testing RL agents, along with a simple interface for interacting with these environments.
Core Features: Diverse Collection Of Environments (From Classic Gridworlds To Atari Games), Simple & Consistent Api For Interacting With Environments, Support For Various Rl Algorithms & Techniques, Easy To Use & Integrate With Different Frameworks, Extensive Documentation & Community Support
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Applied Computer Science
